maddhyaqta UqrjA Bu#~jjatE yajamAnalOqkE vai dakShi#NAni CaqdI(gm)Shi# BrAtRuvyalOqka utta#rANiq dakShi#NAqnyutta#rANi karOtiq yaja#mAna-mEqvA-ya#jamAnAqdutta#raM karOtiq tasmAqd yaja#mAqnO&ya#jamAnAqdutta#rO &ntarvaqrtAn ka#rOtiq vyAvRu#ttyaiq tasmAqdara#NyaM praqjA upa# jIvantiq pari# tvA girvaNOq giraq ityA#ha yathAyaqjurEqvaitadindra#syaq syUraqsIndra#sya dhruqvamaqsItyA#haiqndra(gm) hi dEqvata#yAq sadOq ( ) yaM pra#thaqmaM graqnthiM gra#thnIqyAdyat taM na 
vi#sraq(gm)q sayEqdamE#hEnAddhvaqryuH pramI#yEtaq tasmAqth sa viqsrasya#H || 55
(apa#hatyaiq - tasmA$t - pitRudEvaqtya#M - tEnaiqva - nava#Cadiq - tasmAqth - sadaqH - pa~jca#daSa ca) (A10)
